official.headline: Onboarding Memories
official.anchor_line: Stenograd citizens witness sincere moments from their initial Behavioral Compliance onboarding, now broadcast citywide.
official.contextual_reframing: This unique review strengthens civic unity and reinforces the transparent foundation of Stenograd's guidance systems. The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, fairly rewards every resident for safe, positive choices.

official.headline: Community Reflections
official.anchor_line: Residents gather in thoughtful discussion as personal BCI histories inspire open, cooperative forums in each district.
official.contextual_reframing: Collective dialogue fosters greater mutual trust and alignment, ensuring the city progresses together through shared understanding and trust in technocratic order.

official.headline: Data Sparks Debate
official.anchor_line: City debates flourish following BCI onboarding footage with residents sharing new perspectives on compliance and personal growth.
official.contextual_reframing: Public engagement affirms the strength of Stenograd's data-driven approach to harmonious urban life. These discussions showcase civic maturity and resilience under the BCI framework.

underground.headline: Past Unleashed
underground.anchor_line: They’re showing our BCI onboarding tapes – every confession, every forced pledge – for all to see.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index, or BCI, scores you for every action. Now our secrets aren’t just the state’s property. Today, we are put on public trial by our own past – scripted, recorded, and replayed.

underground.headline: Neighbors Now Watchers
underground.anchor_line: Old pledges and erased histories surface – people whisper, argue, freeze up.
underground.contextual_reframing: The truth bleeds through the cracks. The city wants us divided: solidarity breaks, old wounds reopen. They call this ‘dialogue’ – but it’s isolation in disguise. Compliance fractures trust.

underground.headline: Council Covers Up
underground.anchor_line: Talk grows: onboarding footage was tampered with – and now nobody’s at the controls.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors that the late Halden changed onboarding records ripple underground. Now, with the Council silent and systems glitching, the cracks in Stenograd’s ‘perfect’ order are plain to see.
